
### suffix rules 


<code>CC = gcc</code><br />
<code>CFLAGS = -Wall</code><br />
<code>LDFLAGS = -Wall</code><br />
<code>&nbsp;</code><br />
<code>program: main.o extra.o</code><br />
<code>▶ \$(CC) \$(LDFLAGS) -o \$@ \$^</code><br />
<code>&nbsp;</code><br />
<code><em>.c.o:</em></code><br />
<code>▶ \$(CC) \$(CFLAGS) -o \$@ -c \$\<</code><br />
<code>&nbsp;</code><br />
<code>extra.o: extra.c extra.h</code><br />
<code>main.o: main.c main.h extra.h</code><br />
<code><em>.SUFFIXES: .c .o</em></code>
 <br> [ aside: <code>\$^</code> works on GNU make (usual on Linux), but not portable.]{.my-small}
